import React,{useEffect} from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import {useDispatch, useSelector}from 'react-redux' const Header = () => { const number = useSelector((state) =>state.number); const {user} = useSelector((state) =>state.user); const dispatch=useDispatch console.log(user) return (
home
add_shopping_cart {number}
{ user.id ? Action Another action Something else // {user.email} : login }
) } export default Header
